name: acid halides
description: Updated to include sulphonyl halides (chido 21-07-2007), excluding sulfonyl halides (RK 24-11-2016)

name: alkyl halides
description: except F (w/o X4 -> any C-Hal, includes also acid halides)

name: aldehydes
description: (carbon atom with one hydrogen atom and double bonded oxygen)

name: diketo
description: some carbons in four membered rings are flagged as aromatic

name: sulphates
description: (have to be deprotonated with charger bevor)

name: cycloheptane
description: in fused rings, includes substituted rings

name: cyclooctane
description: in fused rings, includes substituted rings

name: thio ester
description: DROP in future, too generic and included in esters

name: beta-keto/anhydride
description: double bonded if in ring would be okay (but then it is classified as an Michael acceptor)

name: het-C-het not in ring
description: modify rule -> one hetero atom can be in a ring

name: Aliphatic long chain
description: this hits aliphatic non branched chains of at least 5 atoms

name: esters
description: do not hit carbamates, modify rule -> C(=O)ON should also be excluded

name: ketone_thioketone
description: hits all aromatic carbons connected a C not in a ring connected to a (=O) connected to any carbon

name: thioether
description: hits all thio ethers connected to an aromatic carbon

name: halo purine
description: other purines or hit by halo pyrimidine rule
